title: Looking for a Discord or Community based around arams
body:
Pretty much as the title says, I'm looking for a Discord or Community based around playing arams. I'm also not opposed to play custom arams/inhouses too, myabe some norms here and there.

Really just need a group of people who are here to have fun in arams tbh. Thanks.

replies.body:
https://discord.gg/smFD2Pm


i have a aram discord solely focused on aram only
I know a few, but none explicitly revolving around ARAMs, unfortunately.

I would prefer arams but I can handle normals, just need in a ranked mood... kinda sick of the same shit over and over again for the last few years. I'm mainly waiting for next season with the whole runes rework. That will make it fun I think... who knows..
